text:
@NikkiHaley @standamericanow This WH served up an American resident journalist to a nation state for torture, murder and dismembering. Under your watch. #JusticeforKhashoggi
Currently Trump et GOP sit silent on #RussianBounty. 137K in US dead from #COVID19. Where's your courage Nikki? [chicklets rattling]
